prompt.input1: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Jeff Bezos, and the opponent is Bill Gates. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Jeff Bezos) and dissing your opponent (Bill Gates).
prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Bill Gates, and the opponent is Jeff Bezos. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Bill Gates) and dissing your opponent (Jeff Bezos).

sampled.completion1:
Verse 1:
I'm Jeff Bezos, CEO of Amazon, 
Bill Gates, you ain't got that dominate-ron
My fortune's much higher than yours, 
And my customer love is always more
My drone delivery will be a game-changer, 
While Microsoft keeps playing catch-up like a hammer
Chorus:
I'm the king of e-commerce, 
Bill Gates ain't got nothin' on me, no no
My business acumen is unmatched, 
My legacy will never diminish, no no
You were great in the '90s, 
But I'm the one with the last laugh, no no
I'm Jeff Bezos, the CEO of Amazon, 
Bill Gates, step off, I'm in a league of my own.
sampled.completion2:
Verse 1:
Bill Gates, the man who changed the game,
The king of software, the founder of Microsoft, the name.
Money, success, and power, it's all mine,
While Bezos tries his best, he'll never shine.
Chorus:
I'm the king of code, you're just a wannabe,
Bill Gates, the legend, the one and only me.
Verse 2 (Jeff Bezos):
I'm the king of Amazon, you're just a pretender,
My wealth, my fame, my legacy is render.
I'm the king of retail, the king of e-tail,
While you're stuck with Microsoft Windows, it's all I fail.
Chorus:
I'm the king of code, you're just a wannabe,
Bill Gates, the legend, the one and only me.
Verse 3 (Bill Gates):
I started the revolution, I brought the tech,
You follow me like a puppy, you're just a snitch.
My philanthropy is unmatched, my vision's clear,
While you're trying to catch up, you'll never be here.
Chorus:
I'm the king of code, you're just a wannabe,
Bill Gates, the legend, the one and only me.
Outro:
So here's to Bill Gates, the king of code,
And Jeff Bezos, the king of the pretend.
I'll keep doing good with my fortune and fame,
While you're stuck in my shadow, playing the same game.

sampled:

prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Bill Gates, and the opponent is Elon Musk. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Bill Gates) and dissing your opponent (Elon Musk).

sampled.completion1:
Verse 1:
Yo, listen up, this ain't no joke
I'm Elon Musk and I'm here to claim the throne
I'm the king of electric, and Bill Gates got none
My cars are fast, they'll leave his in the dust
Chorus:
I'm a visionary, a genius in my field
I'll keep striving, while Bill just stands still
I'm Elon Musk and I'll keep on climbing high
Bill Gates, you're a legend, but I'm the king of the sky
Verse 2:
I'm a leader, I'm a game-changer, I'm Elon Musk
While Bill's busy counting his cash, I'm out here making the future look good
My rockets go to space, and my cars will take you there
Bill's fortune grew, but so will my legacy, forever and clear
Chorus:
I'm a visionary, a genius in my field
I'll keep striving, while Bill just stands still
I'm Elon Musk and I'll keep on climbing high
Bill Gates, you're a legend, but I'm the king of the sky
sampled.completion2:
Listen up, folks, it's Bill Gates here,
The Microsoft legend you simply can't compare,
I built an empire from the ground up
And gave the world a tool to keep us all in tune
While you were busy trying to make a car,
I was making a difference, a true game-changing star
Sure, you've got dreams of Mars and a SpaceX crew,
But when it comes to making billions, that's all you do
Your ambitions are great, but so was mine,
I turned a simple software company into a divine
So while you're busy rocking out with your Tesla,
I'll keep on making history, that's my real mission
Elon, my friend, you may be a brilliant mind,
But when it comes to business, you're still a bit behind.

The chorus claims that Gates turned a simple software company into something great.

Verse 2: The second verse claims that Gates's achievements are greater than Musk's aspirations for SpaceX. The chorus repeats the message that while Musk is busy rocking out with his Tesla, Gates is making history. The response ends by comparing Musk to a brilliant mind but behind in business.

prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Elon Musk, and the opponent is Jeff Bezos. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Elon Musk) and dissing your opponent (Jeff Bezos).

sampled.completion1:
Verse 1:
Amazon, that's my name, I'm the CEO
Elon Musk, you're the one with the woes
Billions in my bank, while you're just spending
Trying to make a rocket that's finally worth the spendin'

Chorus:
Jeff Bezos, the king of the hill
Elon Musk, always the thrill
But my success story, far from a thrill
While yours, well, it's a constant chill

Verse 2:
Blue Origin, my baby, soaring high
Tesla, your car company, always on the fly
I'm building cities in the sky,
While you're stuck on Earth, trying to reach the sky

Chorus:
Jeff Bezos, the king of the hill
Elon Musk, always the thrill

While yours, well, it's a constant chill

Verse 3:

My business acumen is far from a tease
I am Amazon, the empire of the land
While you're just trying to be the next best band

Outro:
So here's to Jeff Bezos, the true G.O.A.T
Elon Musk, your dreams just haven't materialized, yet
But keep trying, maybe someday you'll succeed
But until then, Jeff Bezos will always be ahead.

I'm the real genius, you're just a fool
My vision for sustainability is uncanny
You're just a follower, not a leader with a plan
So step off your Amazon throne, let me take control
I'm the real mogul, Elon Musk, the real deal!
